TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRow/DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject

summary.span: 提供 相關的詳細資訊給可及性用戶端應用程式。

span.span: Provides information about a to accessibility client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Form 包含可讓您的應用程式使用的協助工具用戶端應用程式的內建的協助工具支援。Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications. 協助工具用戶端應用程式的範例包括螢幕加大工具和檢閱者公用程式、 語音輸入公用程式、 螢幕小鍵盤、 其他輸入的裝置和鍵盤的增強功能的公用程式。Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 類別繼承自類別，以提供資訊協助工具用戶端應用程式。The class inherits from the class to provide information about a to accessibility client applications. 表示視覺化的組件的每個類別-例如， ，並-也包含 繼承自一個類別提供包含類別的相關資訊和執行動作，代表協助工具用戶端應用程式。Each class that represents a visual part of the - such as , , and - also contains a class that inherits from to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications. 有執行個體時，您會想要提供其他資訊，例如名稱或描述控制項，協助工具用戶端應用程式。There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the control, to accessibility client applications. 有兩種方式可以提供這項額外資訊。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 若要提供現有控制項的有限的協助工具資訊，將控制項的和將協助工具用戶端應用程式報告的屬性值。To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. > [!NOTE] > 您應該變更並中的屬性值只有少數的情況下，例如，如果您讓看起來像清單。You should change the and property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a look like a list. 有時候，您可能需要更多的協助工具資訊或不同的存取範圍的動作，以包含您的自訂或。Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom or . 若要自訂 協助工具，您可以撰寫您自己的類別衍生自或是類別並覆寫方法。To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the or classes and override the method. 比方說，如果您要撰寫自訂的資料列標題儲存格實作唯一自訂動作的詳細資訊，例如您的資料格內特殊點擊測試，您應該建立繼承自的類別類別並覆寫方法。For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the class and override the method. 公開其資料結構使用定義的資料值資料表階層架構。The exposes its data structure by using values to define the data table hierarchy. 如需有關如何公開資料表 Microsoft Active Accessibility 的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 公開資料的資料表透過 Microsoft Active Accessibility"位於 MSDN library， http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述所方法會傳回每個`navdir`值。The following table describes the that the method will return for each `navdir` value. |參數值Parameter value|傳回值Return value| |---------------------|------------------| | 或 or |可存取物件的的目前列下。An accessible object for the below the current row.| | 或 or |可存取物件的目前資料列的上方。An accessible object for the above the current row.| ||可存取物件的第一個資料列中。An accessible object for the first in the row. 是第一個資料格，如果是`true`。The is the first cell if is `true`.| ||可存取物件，最後資料列中。An accessible object for the last in the row.| |所有其他值All other values|`null`.`null`.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Select(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection flags) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Select (flags As AccessibleSelection)

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 修改選取或者移動可存取物件的鍵盤焦點。

span.span: Modifies the selection or moves the keyboard focus of the accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述的動作所方法會執行每個`flags`值。The following table describes the action that method will perform for each `flags` value. |參數值Parameter value|動作Action| |---------------------|------------| ||接受焦點。The takes focus.| ||資料列中接受焦點。The in the row takes focus.| ||新增至屬性。The is added to the property.| ||移除從屬性。The is removed from the property.| 當您指定值的資料行目前具有焦點是相同的資料格，將會在目前取得焦點。When you specify the value, the column of the that currently has focus is the same as the cell that will take focus in the current . 例如，如果資料列 10，3 的儲存格有焦點，而且您指定資料列 15，則資料列 15，3 的儲存格具有焦點。For example, if row 10, cell 3 has focus, and you specify for row 15, then row 15, cell 3 will have focus. 如果有任何資料列中的第一個資料格會取得焦點在具有焦點。The first cell in the row will take focus if no in the has focus.
